title: After-Christmas TV sales 2023: $1,000 off at Best Buy, Walmart and Amazon
description: The after-Christmas TV sales event is live, and I'm rounding up all the best deals with over $1,000 off from Best Buy, Walmart and Amazon.

title: Samsung's best bargain phone looks expensive and its back to its lowest price ever
description: Samsung's bargain Galaxy A54 5G is on sale at Amazon for the lowest price we've seen, and it's one of the best bargain phones around.

title: This Best Buy deal drops Samsung's best tablets to the lowest price we've seen
description: Best Buy has deals on the newest and older Galaxy Tab tablets, dropping them to the lowest price we've seen on every model.

title: Dell cosies up with AMD to expand its generative AI portfolio to offer more choice to customers — it's also embracing standards-based networking, a thinly veiled dig at Nvidia
description: Dell's PowerEdge XE9680 system features eight AMD Instinct MI300X AI accelerators each.

title: Best after-Christmas sales 2023: deals from Amazon, Walmart, Target and Best Buy
description: The after-Christmas sales event is now live, and I'm rounding up today's best deals from Amazon, Walmart, Target, and Best Buy.

title: "Simply the best OEM SSD ever made": Micron's new SSD gets glowing reviews thanks to new controller and new NAND — Expect it to come to a workstation PC near you
description: Micron's 3500 1TB SSD is a four-channel PCIe Gen4 SSD that is faster than "99.9%" of its eight-channel rivals.

title: Got an iPad for Christmas? Here are the first 7 apps you should download
description: Must-download apps for photographers, sketchers, note takers and language learners.

title: I held the future of data storage in my hands and it couldn't look weirder - 2024 could be the year DNA storage goes mainstream and it couldn't come sooner
description: A 1,000 Euros DNA card drive with a 1KB capacity is not what you’d expect the future of storage to look like, and yet.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Monday, December 25 (game #700)
